comment.author: 76705984@N04
comment._content:
The LSE Alumni Association recently asked for suggestions of who made up the above picture from alumni in the January newsletter. They suggested:

First from left sitting, (first) Fayyaz Alimohammad, (second)  Lawrence, (third) David Mason, (fourth) Derek Philpott (fifth) Sehezad Naqvi, (sixth) Farrukh Jawad Panni
 
First from left standing, (first) Brian (groundsman),  (third) Martin Folly, (sixth) Andrew Tebb.
